title: YouTube Video Upload and Management Test
description: Verify that users can successfully upload, edit, and manage videos on YouTube. The test should confirm that all video management features work as expected.
preConditions: User has a valid YouTube/Google account and is logged in.
User has appropriate permissions to upload videos.
User has a video file ready for upload.

steps.action: Navigate to the 'Create' button and select 'Upload video'.
steps.expectedResult: The video upload page loads successfully with all form fields visible.

steps.action: Select a video file for upload and wait for the upload to complete.
steps.expectedResult: The video file is uploaded successfully and the details form is displayed.

steps.action: Enter video details (title, description, thumbnail, visibility) and save changes.
steps.expectedResult: The system saves the video details and begins processing the video.

steps.action: Navigate to the 'Your videos' section and verify the uploaded video is present.
steps.expectedResult: The uploaded video appears in the list with the correct details and status.
